_prev_prog_2.Description: The Springdale Energy Units 3, 4 & 5 are a nominal 540-megawatt, three unit, combined cycle combustion turbine power plant constructed on approximately a 20 acre site located in Springdale Township, Allegheny County, PA. The facility operates a 29.5% aqueous ammonia storage, delivery truck unloading and SCR feed system.

Planned Changes to Improve Safety



As a result of the Process Hazard Analysis and Off-site Consequence Analysis the following changes were or will be implemented:

?    Add periodic piping testing per API 570 to PM system. 

?    Modify monthly tank checklist to inspect signage, bollard and collision protection.

?    Install wind socks for determining wind direction at 4 corners of site.

?    Modify Emergency Action Plan to determine wind direction from wind socks and plan evacuation/shelter in place activities based on wind direction.

?    Update Emergency Action Plan to include the new requirements in 40 CFR 68.90-68.96 including annual emergency response coordination activities and annual notification exercises.
